name: Metro 2033 Redux

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Metro 2033 Redux/metro.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /LANG=English /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
